oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Testing of plant extracts for control of apple sawfly
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paaske, Klaus
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fruit and berries
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of the trials was to test potential plant extracts for control of apple sawfly. The products Quassia-MD, NeemAzal T/S and Tracer were selected for testing. All 3 substances are allowed in organic production according to EU Regulation 837/2007, but use in Denmark requires that the products are approved by Milj√∏styrelsen as a pesticide, but none of the products have been approved until now.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Paaske, Klaus (2013) Testing of plant extracts for control of apple sawfly. Aarhus University, Department of Agroecology.
